long_description: Perfect for a day of backcountry skiing or a cold-weather hike, the lightweight REI Revelcloud hat combines a water-resistant shell with PrimaLoft(R) Sport insulation to keep your head warm. Pertex(R) recycled-polyester shell resists wind and rain and has a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed moisture. PrimaLoft(R) Sport insulation is lightweight and efficient. Earflaps add warmth for chilly winter days. Reflective hits in front and back increase visibility in low light. 2.375 in. brim keeps sun and snowflakes out of your eyes. Fine-tune the fit of the REI Revelcloud hat with the bungee and cordlock.
